definition: to take revenge and wipe out a grudge (idiom)
to announce/to inform/report/newspaper/recompense/revenge/CL:份[fen4],張|张[zhang1]
hatred/animosity/enmity/foe/enemy/to feel animosity toward (the wealthy, foreigners etc)
spouse/companion
surname Qiu
snow/snowfall/CL:場|场[chang2]/to have the appearance of snow/to wipe away, off or out/to clean
surname Xue
to hate/to regret

sentences.english: Yet he became very annoyed and resolved to find a means of avenging himself.
sentences.chinese: 可他又非常非常的惱怒，決定找個法子報仇雪恨。

sentences.english: Now is the time for you to pay off old scores.
sentences.chinese: 現在是你報仇雪恨的時候了。

sentences.english: This riot was designed to revenge .
sentences.chinese: 這次暴動正是爲了報仇雪恨。

sentences.english: It looked at you with a vengeful aspect.
sentences.chinese: 它用一種報仇雪恨的神情望着你。
